We are using [http://code.google.com/p/acra/ ACRA] to receive crash reports from users.

On the Google Docs Spreadsheet, we use colors to differentiate the status of the issues reported:

 * Not handled yet
 * <font color="red">Won't be fixed</font>
 * <font color="blue">Reported on Google Code</font>
 * <font color="green">Fixed</font>
